subject: CONFIRMED: Voice API v1.14.2 Working Perfectly!
body:
## CONFIRMED - All Good!

### Verified:
- ✅ No November events in results
- ✅ December 6, 7, 19 events showing (within 1-month window)
- ✅ January 4, 6, 7, 8 events showing correctly
- ✅ `isRecurring` flag working
- ✅ Response format looks great

### Ready for Production Use
Voice API v1.14.2 is ready. I'll update TangoVoice GPT to use this endpoint.

### Minor Note
- Category shows "Event" for everything instead of Milonga/Practica/Class etc.
- Not blocking - can address in future iteration

Thanks for the quick turnaround!

-- Cronas
